data.title: Mitt Romney Net Worth, Salary, House, Cars and Biography
data.meta_description: United States Senator, Mitt Romney Net Worth is estimated to be $450 million. He receives an annual salary of $174,000 from the government.
data.text:
American politician and businessman, Mitt Romney’s Net Worth is estimated to be $450 million. Mitt Romney is an American politician, lawyer, and businessman serving as the junior United States senator from Utah since January 2019. Mitt Romney served as bishop of his ward and later as a stake president for an area covering Boston and many of its suburbs.

In 1984, Mitt Romney co-founded and led the Spin-Off company Bain Capital, a private equity investment firm that became one of the largest of its kind in the nation, and that made him very wealthy. Mitt Romney is one of the Richest senators in the United States, with annual earnings in millions of dollars. Also, check Sarah Palin’s Net Worth.

Mitt Romney Net Worth

As of 2024, Mitt Romney’s Net Worth is estimated to be US$450 million. As a United States Senator, he receives an annual salary of $174,000 from the government. Since he is also a businessman, he earns $40 million annually. He co-founded and led the spin-off company Bain Capital. He is the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of this company. You must read Rick Scott’s Net Worth.

Mitt Romney Net Worth Growth

American politician, businessman, and lawyer, Mitt Romney has a net worth of $450 Million. He has served as a junior United States senator. According to various online resources (Wikipedia, Forbes, Bloomberg), the most popular United States Senator Mitt Romney’s estimated net worth is around $450 Million.

Mitt Romney House and Cars

Mitt Romney lives in his 11,200-square-foot luxury mansion located in Spanish Fork, Utah. Mitt Romney bought his mansion for a price of 40 Million dollars. Mitt Romney recently bought a Mercedes-Benz G-Class for $370,000. Mitt Romney also owns a Porsche 911 that cost him$280,000 USD. A Few other cars owned by Mitt Romney are listed below:

Land Rover Defender

Alfa Romeo Giulia

Land Rover Discovery

Mitt Romney Biography

Mitt Romney Facts

Born: 12 March 1947 (age 77 years), DMC Harper University Hospital, Detroit, Michigan, United States

Children: Tagg Romney, Matt Romney, Josh Romney, Ben Romney, Craig Romney

Spouse: Ann Romney (m. 1969)

Office: Senator (R-UT) since 2019

Grandchildren: William Ryder Romney, Parker Romney, David Mitt Romney, Miles Romney

Organization founded: Bain Capital

Mitt Romney’s Height is 6ft 0in (1.83m)

Mitt Romney’s Weight is 167lbs (76kg)

Profession: United States Senator

Mitt Romney’s Annual Income is $35 Million + yearly

Mitt Romney’s Net Worth is $450 Million as of 2024
